synopsis.text: Yuichi Ito presents a thought-provoking anime short film, directed by Mayuko Yamakita, from the Tokyo University of the Arts' 2011 Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation. The story revolves around a young woman who receives shocking news from her doctor: she is pregnant. Overwhelmed and distraught, she struggles to cope with her new reality, leading her to experience vivid hallucinations and delusions. As she navigates her tumultuous emotions, the line between reality and fantasy blurs, creating a dreamlike state that is both transient and heart-wrenching. With captivating music by Miki Sakurai and sound design by Masumi Takino, this poignant anime delves into the depths of the human psyche and explores the complexities of unexpected life changes.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
